original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho navipāko dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham vipākam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
anidassana appaṭigham na iva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
